intro: Hello! I'm Sasidharan Rathinam, a Senior Data Engineer and Consultant with over 9 years of experience in building scalable data platforms.

sections.title: Professional Background
sections.content: My journey began with traditional ETL and database warehousing, but I quickly pivoted to the modern data stack as the cloud revolution took hold. I've worked across various industries, including FinTech, Healthcare, and E-commerce, helping startups and enterprises migrate to the cloud, optimize their data pipelines, and democratize data access.

sections.title: Engineering Philosophy
sections.content: I believe in Simplicity over Complexity. A complex system is hard to maintain and prone to failure. My approach is to design pipelines that are idempotent, fault-tolerant, and observable. I write code that is not just functional but also readable and maintainable by others.

sections.title: Freelancing Approach
sections.content: As a consultant, I don't just write code; I partner with your business. I focus on understanding your core business problems first, then design data solutions that drive real value. Whether it's reducing AWS costs or speeding up critical dashboards, my goal is measurable impact.

timeline.description: Helping startups scale data infrastructure on AWS & GCP.
Lead architect for enterprise data lake migration project processing 50TB+ daily.
Built foundational ETL pipelines and data warehouses for retail analytics.
